speeches: Won't you watch my final performance?
Thank you for freeing me and watching my performance until the very end.
Your moves were amazing. Although I'd like to see them in a situation where you're not trying to kill me.
A performance has got to be entertaining, no?
That was a little too engaging for me... Still, I hope that this won't be your last performance.
Your moves were stunning. I would love to see more of them.
I see. If that is the case, then I shall continue to perform for you.
